title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Wood Inputs Survey) Order
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Wood Inputs Survey) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (wood input survey) order

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No. 691/2011 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 6 July 20111, as amended by Regulation (EU) No. 
538/2014 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 April 20142, 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/125 of 19 November 20213 and 
Regulation (EU) 2024/3024 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
27 November 20244; 

“survey” means the Wood Inputs Survey that is conducted by the Central 
Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - regulation mean regulation (eu) no 691 2011 european parliament council 6 july 20111 amended regulation (eu) no 538 2014 european parliament council 16 april 20142 commission delegated regulation (eu) 2022 125 19 november 20213 regulation (eu) 2024 3024 european parliament council 27 november 20244 survey mean wood input survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section A, B, C, D, F, G, M, N or R of NACE Rev. 2.1 set out in 
Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 20 December 20065, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 
295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20086, 
Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
18 January 20127, Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
for the purposes of the survey and once only in respect of each such year, 
information the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule in relation 
to each of the years 2024, 2025, 2026, 2027 and 2028 is hereby prescribed. 

8 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 
9 OJ No. L 19, 20.1.2023, p. 5 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [48]

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: Article 4

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the business activity 
of the undertaking concerned, and specifying the year to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the quantity of coniferous roundwood from publicly-owned and 
privately-owned forests in the State purchased by, and delivered 
to the premises of, the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-coniferous roundwood from publicly-owned 
and privately-owned forests in the State purchased by, and 
delivered to the premises of, the undertaking; 

the quantity of non-roundwood products purchased by, and 
delivered to the premises of, the undertaking from undertakings 
in the State.

MICHEÁL MARTIN,
